permissions: User must be an admin to update stakeholder classifications (StakeholderClassificationPolicy#update?).
side_effects: Updates a stakeholder classification record; when the title changes, background jobs generate objective stakeholder classifications and update objective OpenAI files.
validation_notes: Requires the stakeholder classification ID argument. At least one of --title, --leverage-factor, or --objectives-narrative-explicit must be provided. Title must be unique (case-insensitive) and present if set. Slug is read-only and cannot be changed. Leverage factor must be greater than 0 when provided.

flags.name: --leverage-factor
flags.validation: Must be greater than 0 when provided.
